'''Six-Fingered José's Dilemma''' is a [[Random Event|randomly occurring World Quest]] that can occur in various places across [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
#Defeat the monsters and save [[Six-Fingered José]]
#Talk to Six-Fingered José

==Rewards==
{{Transclude|Random Event|Rewards}}

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Six-Fingered José is in trouble.}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Approach Six-Fingered José)
:'''Paimon:''' Look over there &mdash; someone is being attacked!
:'''Paimon:''' Quick, help them out before something terrible happens!

;(Talk to Six-Fingered José after defeating the monsters)
:'''Six-Fingered José:''' Thank you Traveler, you saved me!
:'''Six-Fingered José:''' I never expected there to be monsters here.
:'''Six-Fingered José:''' I'm just lucky to have run into you. Please, take these for your trouble.
{{Dialogue end}}
